text: aur jab unhonne (misr mein) pravesh kiya, jaise unake pita ne aadesh diya tha, to aisa nahin hua ki vah unhen allaah se kuchh bacha sake; parantu ye yaaqoob ke dil mein ek vichaar utpann hua, jise usane poora kar liya[1] aur vaastav mein, vah usaka gyaanee tha, jo gyaan hamane use diya tha. parantu adhikaansh log is (kee vaastavikta) ka gyaan nahin rakhate
